title: Caradhras Has Not Forgiven Us (1R123)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	3
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Spell. Weather. Maneuver: Exert a [Isengard] minion and spot 5 companions to discard an exhausted companion (except the Ring-bearer).
Lore:	”'It was no ordinary storm. It is the ill will of Caradhras.'”
Rarity:	R
